content: this is the same pattern as my 2x2 ribbed hat recently uploaded but in a lighter yarn weight therefore the name this is a good project if you have a single ball left so you can mix and match your colours be creative and use those leftover balls i had one ball of light grey and one ball of dark grey therefore my colour combinations this is a much lighter version than the first hat so it took a bit longer to knit i will look in my stash and see if i can find more of these lonely balls and do more colour combination hats happy knitting
